# Introduction

RGMQLlib is a data package containing compiled libraries in jar format
used by the RGMQL package 

# Contents of the package
GMQL Scala API

They are available in jar format within the extdata directory of this package 
and can be located through r 
```
system.file('extdata', 'java', package='RGMQLlib')
```
